name: Website Content QA (1)
description: Ask questions about text and links from a given URL. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

node.description: Fetch and parse text and links from a given URL.

code_CustomComponent-f6nOg.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Data
import html2text

class ConvertHTMLToMarkdown(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "HTML to Markdown"
    description: str = "Converts HTML content to Markdown format."

    def build(self, html_content: Data, ignore_links: bool = False) -> str:
        converter = html2text.HTML2Text()
        converter.ignore_links = ignore_links
        markdown_text = converter.handle(html_content)
        self.status = markdown_text
        return markdown_text
code_CustomComponent-f6nOg.name: code

code_CustomComponent-FGzJJ.name: code

code_CustomComponent-0XtUN.value:
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Data

class ParseHTMLContent(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "Parse HTML"
    description: str = "Parses HTML content using Beautiful Soup."

    def build(self, html_content: Data) -> Data:
        soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser')
        self.status = soup
        return soup
code_CustomComponent-0XtUN.name: code

code_CustomComponent-ODIcp.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Data

class ExtractHyperlinks(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "Extract Hyperlinks"
    description: str = "Extracts hyperlinks from parsed HTML content."

    def build(self, soup: Data) -> list:
        links = [link.get('href') for link in soup.find_all('a')]
        self.status = links
        return links
code_CustomComponent-ODIcp.name: code

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Data
import requests

class FetchHTMLContent(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "URL Input"

    def build(self, url: str) -> str:
        return url
code_CustomComponent-OACE0.name: code

code_CustomComponent-whsQ5.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent

class ListToMarkdownBullets(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "List to Bullets"
    description: str = "Converts a Python list into Markdown bullet points."

    def build(self, items: list) -> str:
        markdown_bullets = '\n'.join(f'* {item}' for item in items)
        return markdown_bullets
code_CustomComponent-whsQ5.name: code

class ParseHTMLContent(CustomComponent):

    description: str = "Parses HTML content using Beautiful Soup."

from axiestudio.field_typing import Data

class ExtractHyperlinks(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "Extract Hyperlinks"
    description: str = "Extracts hyperlinks from parsed HTML content."

    def build(self, soup: Data) -> list:
        links = [link.get('href') for link in soup.find_all('a')]
        self.status = links

class ListToMarkdownBullets(CustomComponent):
